required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: SHR-1210 Combined With Local Treatment in NSCLC Patients With BM
clinical_study.official_title: SHR-1210 Combined With Local Treatment in Non-small Cell Lung Cancer（NSCLC） Patients With Brain Metastasis （BM）, a Single-arm, Open-labeled Phase II Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of SHR-1210 combined with local treatment of brain metastases in non-small cell lung cancer with brain metastases .

detailed_description.textblock: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of SHR-1210 combined with local treatment of brain metastases (WBRT, r-knife, SRS, etc.) in non-small cell lung cancer with brain metastases .
